attributes.action: Knight Kevin Sinfield over Gareth Southgate and Sadiq Khan
attributes.additional_details: Knight Kevin Sinfield for his charity work over Gareth Southgate and Sadiq Khan.
attributes.background: Knight Kevin Sinfield for his charity work

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
